name: nodejs-aws-lambda-s3
description: nodejs on aws lambda with terraform, to handle uploads to s3. by @roxsross

scripts.aws:plan: npm run pack && cd terraform && terraform plan -var-file=tfvars/dev.tfvars
scripts.aws:deploy: npm run pack && cd terraform && terraform apply -var-file=tfvars/dev.tfvars -auto-approve

author: Rossana Suarez @roxsross
